title: Feature:  Navigate to and open a long-form article
custom_preconds: Given: the user navigates to home page
custom_steps: When the user deep links to long form article with url "https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/news/featured/masanori-murakami-first-japanese-player-in-mlb?t=longform"
custom_expected: Then the is navigated to this page

title: Feature:  Long form Header from news

Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article page using "https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/news/featured/masanori-murakami-first-japanese-player-in-mlb?t=longform"
custom_steps: When the user views the long form article page
custom_expected: Then the user sees the navigation options

custom_steps: When the user views the long form article page
custom_expected: Then the user sees a full-bleed (edge to edge) Hero image

title: Feature:  Long-form Byline

custom_steps: When the user views the long form article page
custom_expected:

And a round photographic image of the writer
And the date the article was posted below the headline

title: Feature: Social media links

custom_steps: When the user views the long form article page
custom_expected:
Then opposite the byline the user sees these social media 
icon links:
   - Facebook
   - Twitter
   - Email

custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to a Facebook login
that enables sharing of that specific article

title: Article will support insta story
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on a long form article
  https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/orioles/news/featured/birdland-insider-putting-down-roots-the-dl-hall-story
  https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/orioles/news/featured/copy-of-birdland-insider-putting-down-roots-the-dl-hall-story
AND I have forge setting open for this: 
  https://forge.mlbinfra.com/#/wcm/stories/74d9a062-f895-4252-8a94-3b94faf2410b
  https://forge.mlbinfra.com/#/wcm/stories/26e331b6-565f-4554-beb2-f07dd4593695
custom_steps: WHEN I insert or update an instagram story URL
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the newly updated instagram story
AND I should see all instagram embedded functionalities

title:
Feature:  Navigate to
and open a long-form
article on a mobile 
device
custom_preconds:
Given: the user navigates to https://www.mlb.com
   And is viewing the 'home' screen
custom_steps:
When the user scrolls down the center ('news') section
   And locates a 'news' screen component 
   And the component shows the writer's byline
   And the first few lines of an article
   And a "Continue Reading" button
   And clicks the "Continue Reading" button
custom_expected: Then the corresponding 'long-form' article opens

Feature:  Long form
navigation
custom_preconds:

   And locates the navigation
custom_expected:

   - TEAMS
   - QUIZZES AND GAMES 
   - HISTORY 
   - CUT4CAST 
   - CORTE4

title:
Feature:  'Full Quote'
page element
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a graphic element called 'Full Quote'
   And the element shows a quote taken from the body
of the article
   And the full quote displays in ~3X larger type than the body
of the article
   And the 'full quote' is accented on the left by a red vertical
line
   And the 'full quote' is indented to the right of the vertical line
    https://www.screencast.com/t/HcjJlqTJiJGI

title:
Feature:  Photographic
or graphic page 
element
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down the page
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a graphic or photographic image that 
pertains to the article 
   And the image does not link to other content

title:
Feature:  Advertising
page element
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down the page
custom_expected:
Then the user sees an advertising page element
   And the advertising is any size up to full bleed
(edge to edge)
   And the advertising is tagged with an "ADVERTISEMENT"
label
   And the ad contains a button to link to external content

title:
Feature:  Parallax
advertising page
element

Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down the page
custom_expected:
Then the user views a 'Parallax' advertisement
   And the user successfully scrolls through the 'parallax'
ad 
   And sees multiple layers of the ad while scrolling

(Testers:  Parallax effect = a web pageâ€™s background 
moving at a slower rate than the foreground)

title: Feature:  Credits
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down toward the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a "Credits:" line
   And the line displays "Story by <Writer name>, 
Illustrated by <Illustrator name>"
   And the word, "Credit," is in boldface type

title:
Feature:  "You may 
like"
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down toward the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a "You may like" section
   And the section shows 4 thumbnail images
   And the thumbnails show content that relates to the
main article
   And the thumbnails link to the corresponding content
   And the thumbnails each show a header
   And the thumbnails show the date posted

title:
Feature:  Access "You 
may like" content
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to the "You may
like" section of a long-form article screen
custom_steps: When the user clicks a thumbnail in that section
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the thumbnails content 
page

title:
Feature:  "Related
players
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article screen
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the body of the article
   And scrolls down toward the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a "Related players" section
   And shows thumbnails that correspond to thumbnail(s)
of player(s) who relate to the long-form article

title:
Feature:  Access
"Related players
content
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to the "Related
players" section of a long-form article screen
custom_steps: When the user clicks a thumbnail in that section
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to that player's content 
screen

title: Feature:  Long form Header from cut4
custom_preconds:
Given: the user has navigated to a long-form
article page
custom_steps:
When the user views the article page via cut4 page
   And locates the top navigation
custom_expected: Then the user sees the cut4 banner

title: Contributor details via getContributor query
custom_steps:
WHEN I make a request to DAPI: https://beta-dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/stories/masanori-murakami-first-japanese-player-in-mlb
AND I filter for "slug" value within the tags array
AND I make a graphQL request with the slug value
custom_expected:
THEN I should receive a valid JSON response
AND I should see the name field to have value of "Michael Clair"
AND I should see the twitter handle: michaelsclair

title: Photo album details via getPhotoAlbum query
custom_steps:
WHEN I make a request to DAPI: https://beta-dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/stories/masanori-murakami-first-japanese-player-in-mlb
AND I search for "type" field containing "album" as its value within the parts array
AND I grab in the "slug" value for each of the "type": "album" field
AND I make a graphQL call for each of the slugs

title: Multiple photo albums details via getPhotoAlbum query
